title: Maiyaa Maiyaa Lyrics Guru
stanzas:
naan seeniyil seitha kadal
naan seeniyil seitha kadal
vellai thangathil seitha udal
vellai thangathil seitha udal
un kadhali naane
kadhal naane ...

naan muththam thinbaval
oru murattu poo ival
naan thinamum thorpaval
andha aadai sandaiyil

naan muththam thinbaval
oru murattu poo ival
thinam aadai sandiyile
mudhalil thorpaval.

thiri kuraiyattum
kural vilakku
nee idamsutti
porul vilakku.

ada kadavulai
adaiyum vazhiyil
en peyar ezhuthirukku.

maiyaa maiyaa
nilaavai vannam
poosi vaithukol.

maiyaa maiyaa
en udalinil
olivitta malargalum
poiyaa poiyaa

naan punnagai
seithaal podhum
ada dhisaigal
kuraindhida koodum
en karbame
en kreedame.

enai paarthathume
en kannaadi
enai kadhalikkum

ada pengalai thirudum
pala aangalai vellai
aaradi aayudhum aavene.

menkaatril en moochu
sila yugamaai veesum.
ini naalum en kudalil
pala kookookal koovum.

kamaa kamaa idhu podhumaa
en paarvai oliyai
kaalangal thaedum

mai mai maiyaa
mai mai maiyaa

naan muththam thinbaval
oru murattu poo ival
thinam aadai sandiyile
mudhalil thorpaval.

thiri kuraiyattum
kural vilakku
nee idamsutti
porul vilakku.

ada kadavulai
adaiyum vazhiyil
en peyar ezhuthirukku.

seo.title: Maiyaa Maiyaa Lyrics Guru
seo.description: Get the complete Maiyaa Maiyaa Lyrics Guru from Guru. composed by AR Rahman and sung by Chinmayi. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Guru, AR Rahman, Chinmayi, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
